metadata.name: Suspicious Nohup Execution
metadata.comment: Detects execution of binaries located in potentially suspicious locations via "nohup"

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/nohup')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/tmp/')))

output.summary: Detects execution of binaries located in potentially suspicious locations via "nohup"
